main.name: Karin Deutsch
main.bio: Hello, I'm Karin Deutsch, a dedicated environmental engineer with a passion for full-stack development. I'm on a mission to combine my expertise in environmental sustainability with my technical skills to create innovative solutions for a greener future.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details or hire me as a Freelancer or Employee.

resume.skillmessage: I have experiences in HTML, CSS, JS, Java, Android Studio, Linux and more. Additional to that I am certified project manager, have branch knowledge in medicine and environment.

education.description: Computer Science with focus on Software Development and Programming
Environmental Engineer with focus on organic Agriculture and Horticulture, Minor in Fieldbotany and certified Project Manager
